TopicTitle: Is there a good mod to make custom categories to sort parts by?

Articles.Content: i'm trying to make my own mod that utilizes BDB which has +1,000 parts which i need to go through one by one and organize and its giving me a headache. are there any mods that allow creating custom categories for parts and sorting them by hand? thanks :3

welp... turns out i'm a bit of a fool <:3 the stock game has a feature for this that allows making custom categories that parts can be dragged and dropped into. posting this in case anyone else has this issue too!
